bibl.title: Dionysos, Souchos and Sarapis as Personal Names?
bibl.note: Most divine names are only rarely used for humans and therefore each individual case should be subject to careful scrutiny before being accepted. - 1. Dionysos. - 2. Souchos. - 3. Sarapis. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Willy Clarysse, Dionysos, Souchos and Sarapis as Personal Names?
ZPE 186 (2013) pp. 259-266, nombr. figg. et fac-sim., 1 arbre généal.

Most divine names are only rarely used for humans and therefore each individual case should be subject to careful scrutiny before being accepted. - 1. Dionysos. - 2. Souchos. - 3. Sarapis. - Conclusion.
